Your cookies are a national treasure.
Tourists visit to try your cookies.
Your cookies appear on skyscraper advertisements.
Scam calls, offering people free cookies, are on the rise.
Your cookies are percieved as a gateway to heaven.
The smell of cookies fills your mind.
All people can think about are cookies.
Scientests continuosly fail to recreate your cookie recipe.
Your customers start to ascend after eating enough of your cookies.
People are starting to use your cookies as currency.
Limited editions of your cookies sell for millions online.
You begin to float as you make cookies.
You think about producing cookie-scented soaps.
Customers begin to demand cookie-related drip.
